      • Square

        public Square(boolean spawn,
              java.util.Map<CardinalPoint,java.lang.Boolean> nearbyAccessibility,
              int x,
              int y,
              Arena arena)
        Class constructor, it builds a square
        Parameters:
        spawn - true if the square is spawn, else false
        nearbyAccessibility - Map with the cardinal point and its accessibility from the square
        x - coordinate X of the square
        y - coordinate Y of the square
        arena - which the square has to be related to
